NMDS taxon comparison

Source: R/nmds_taxon_comparison.R
nmds_taxon_comparison.Rd

NMDS taxon comparison

Usage

nmds_taxon_comparison(veg_df, taxon, rare_species, min_plots)

Arguments

veg_df

a properly formatted vegetation dataframe

taxon

the taxon of interest

rare_species

TRUE or FALSE to include or remove, respectively

min_plots

Value

a NMDS of taxon of interest
